Respec currently resets Health,Magicka, and Stamina to 100 (And CarryWeight to 300)
(Will offer other build respec types later)

descriptionHtml:
Blazes Extended Lvling System

(Use Lvl-Up spell to lvl up; Option to auto-lvl up is on the debug menu)
-Option to respec stat lvling at anytime
-Features vanilla Lvling options + Some Extras


Respec currently resets Health,Magicka, and Stamina to 100 (And CarryWeight to 300)
(Will offer other build respec types later)
Note:This mod does not remove Vanilla Lvling menu (but does eliminate the bonuses from the vanilla menu)

Current Lvling Options(Default Settings):
Increase Health By 10
Increase Magicka By 10
Increase Stamina By 10 + 12.5 CarryWeight
Increase AttackSpeed and Movement Speed by 2% (+5 Stamina)
Increase Health&Magicka By 5
Increase Health&Stamina By 5 +6.25 CarryWeight
Increase Magicka/Stamina Regen By .03 and Increase Magicka by 2.5
+ Additional Options


(Notes: Minor = 2.5/Quarter ; Partial = 5/Half; Compared to Full of 10 or 12.5)


(Note:Mod currently does not effect any vanilla content other then iAVDhmsLevelUp and fLevelUpCarryWeightMod global)

Will add more Lvling options later
(Note:Mod keeps track of lvls through a LvlUp Points Value)

Please post comments about any bugs you find so I can fix them(And Endorse if you like).

Requirements:
Skyrim
Files from my mod

Known Incompatibilities:
Third Era Attributes for Skyrim by Faulgor (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13968)(Doesn\'t work because of the method of attribute setting on that mod)


Change-log:
Notes about upgrading from Version 1.0 to 1.1:
If you have placed any points toward Speed, respec before updating(Or you might get less than normal attack speed if you respec later+Missing AttackSpeed Increasements).
1.0 to 1.1:
SpeedAttack now is correctly added on SpeedUpdate()
SpeedMult Global should now correctly be displayed on Speed Enhancer Effect
Font size of menu items now reduced to 9
Can now increase Magicka/Stamina Regen on lvl up (.03 Regen Per Increase)(+2.5 Magicka)
(Stamina Option on vanilla lvl-up menu will still give Additional CarryWeight on version 1.1)
1.1 to 1.2:
-Added Debug menu(Options below are in the new menu)
-Option to increase Lvl-Up points by 999(For Testing)
-Option to Auto-Lvl on Lvl-Up and/or Auto-Spend Lvl Points
-Option to Respec Via Debug menu
-Removed CarryWeight Bonus from the vanilla menu
-Lvl Up Spell now opens the debug menu if you have no lvl up points left
-All Effects effects will now be handled entirely by QuestScript (no respec necessary to update)
-Now displays current Speed & Regen after increasing the Attribute
-Can now choose to spend all LvlUp points toward a single Option via a maximize menu
-Quest Update Block Now Runs Every About 18.5 Seconds
-Can now Customize Attribute Bonuses within the CreationKit via editing the BlazesExtendedLvlingQuest Properties.
1.2 to 1.3:
-Can now choose between 3 different types of respecs (Vanilla/Mage/Rogue)
-Can now increase SpellPower on lvl up
1.3 to 1.4:
-Moved Bonuses Attributes into separate menus
-Added Dexterity Attribute Option(Increases Bow Attack Speed)
-Added PhysicalDefense Attribute Option(Increases Physical Resistance) 
-Can now use a Custom Respec
-Can now edit UpdateFrequency of Quest Update Block
-Maximize Attribute Menus  replaced with Multi Attribute Menus
-Add Option Properties For Exponential Lvling:
(Higher the rank of lvl=More Points Per Lvl)
(Gives it features Elys_Uncapper: points gained at each level up Option while still enabling the additional alternate stat lvling features of the mod)
-Reduced Message Spam(Display Lvl Up Points in Menu)
1.4 to 1.5:
-Creating Separate Functions for each Attribute option in order to reuse redundant code (And to make Easier for Auto-Respecs)
-Added Berserker Respec Option
-Added Archer Respec Option
-Added PureMage Respec Option
-Rebalancing Respecs
-Edited Menus
-Replacing Function Loops with While Loops for the menus
1.5 to 1.6:
-Added Edit Property menu in debug menu
-Now only recalculates Avs if you have at least one in the only calculated if you have at least 1 Point in the respective Bonus Attribute
-Jump Bonus from Agility Now works if you have:Movement mod - jumping and fortify speed by jimhsu
-No Longer Gives any Lvl Up Spells instead craft a new trinket at the tanning station for accessing the lvl menu (to use trinket equip the item;It will access the menu then unequip itself)(Trinket also can be acquired through the console via: help \"Lvl Up Trinket\" 0) 
-Menus are now more compartmentalized
-No Longer upgrades from version 1.0 (Use a previous version first if you need to update from version 1.0)

Note: Mod stores Bonus Attributes in Globals not AVs (Compatible with Heavy Weapons)

Respec Options(Displaying Version 1.5 Stats):
-VanillaStyle: 100 Health: 100 Magicka: 100 Stamina: 300 Carry Weight
-Mage:  Vanilla(Plus Following Changes) -50Health -7StaminaOption +5SpellPowerOption +5RegenOption  
-Rogue: VanillaStyle; -50 Health -50 Magicka -5StaminaOption +15SpeedOption
-Custom Respec: 0 Health: 0 Magicka: 0 Stamina: 175 Carry Weight: +40 Lvl Ups
Note:Custom Respec Gives Enough LvlUp Points to Give Vanilla Starting Stats at lvl 1
-Berserker: 150 Health 150 Stamina 0 Magicka: 362.5 Carry Weight (Aka +50 Health +5StaminaOption -100Magicka)
-PureMage: Starting Stats -100 Stamina -70 Health +7 Regen Option +10 SpellPower Option (
-Archer: VanillaStyle; -50 Health -50 Magicka +10 Dexterity Option

-Required Mods For AgilityBonus(Version 1.6 and Higher Only):
Movement mod - jumping and fortify speed by jimhsu(Only the ScriptDragon Part of mod required)(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14437)
author: BlazesRus
